items.sentence: I have no idea what\'s causing these problems.
It\'s been a while since I\'ve been to Boston.
Tom knows all about Mary\'s personal problems.
Tom made the mistake of trying to do it alone.
Don\'t you know that you\'re being dismissive?
Mary\'s husband is just as stubborn as she is.
I must\'ve heard you say that a million times.
Thank you for helping me clean out the garage.
I\'m glad you\'re not in my circle of friends.
I really didn\'t want to play tennis with Tom.
